text: Alec Baldwin is taking his impeccable Donald Trump impression from the Saturday Night Live set to his own home. The 59 - year - old actor recently showed off his impression to his youngest child Carmen. Baldwin ’ s wife Hilaria Thomas posted on her Instagram page Saturday a video of the actor teaching their 3 - year - old daughter how to do the Trump impression. In the video Hilaria asked, “ Carmen, what day does Daddy play Donald Trump?'' ` ` Saturday,'' Carmen replies. ` ` And we go like this with our hands,'' Alec says, raising both of his with his elbows bent.
